name: Sruthi
greetingText: I must say, you're looking absolutely fantastic today!
wishText: Wishing you a day filled with laughter, cake, and all your favorite things! 🎂🎉
textInChatBox: 🎉 Happy birthday to the amazing Sruthi!! 🎉 May your day be as wonderful as you are!
text3: But then I saw balloons and got distracted.
text4: So I decided to wish you something truly magical instead.
outroText: Hope your day is filled with laughter, love, and lots of surprises!
replayText: Click here if you want to watch the birthday magic again!
